OK, so my hidden node has three input connections -- from the two
inputs an=
d the bias node. The output node has four input connections,
from the two i=
nputs, the bias, and the output of the hidden node. So
that should be suffi=
cient, no?

--Rob

rote:
>
> Actually, depending on your perspective, both of you are correct.=

>  
> If a hidden node is limited to one input and one output it takes two=

hidden
> nodes for XOR.  However mutex nodes of multiple inputs can handle=
 XOR
> internally.
